get.description: Retrieve the overview information of deposit account-This API is deprecated

parameters.name: depositId
parameters.description: Indicates the Id of the deposit account

parameters.name: balanceTypes
parameters.description: Type of balance (e.g. current balance, credit interest accrued, deferred commission, etc.) as defined in the institution's accounting schemas.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

chargeTypes.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

taxRates.description: Indicates tax charged to an account

taxRate.description: Indicates tax charged to an account

charges.description: The charges or fees for this transaction

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

paymentTypeName.description: Indicates Payment type set to an account

propertyName.description: Indicates the Id of the product property

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

chargeSchedulePaymentValue.description: Indicates the payment frequency associated with the charge

dividentPaidYtd.description: Interest accrued for the specified period

lastPaidDivident.description: Deprecated - Interest accrued for the specified period

periodEnding.description: Indicates the end date of the interest period

settlements.description: Indicates settlement conditions associated with the account

payinSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payin Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payinAccountId.description: Indicates the Payin Settlement Account. The account from which funds are to be debited against the payment type.

payoutSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payout Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payoutAccountId.description: Indicates the Payout Settlement Account. The account into which funds are to be credited against the payment type.

propertyId.description: The identifier of the product condition

propertyClassId.description: The identifier of a condition that is used to build a product

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

maturesIn.description: Indicates a date or period within which an account gets matured

coolingOffDate.description: Indicates cooling off period for an account until which pre-closure can be triggered without incurring any fees or charges.

term.description: Indicates the period to which the BID and OFFER rates apply

termAmount.description: The monetary amount applied to the account

cancellationPeriod.description: Indicates the Period beyond which a contract is cancelled if it not fully funded in case of deposit or fully disbursed in case of the loan

earlyRedemptionFee.description: Indicates the early redemption fee that is associated during closure before account maturity

withdrawalFee.description: Indicates fee charged for the withdrawals

interestRate.description: Identifies the bid rate of the related currency for the defined time period

accrualAmount.description: Indicates interest accumulated for an account for the defined time period

accruedInterest.description: The amount of interest that has been accrued

paymentType.description: Indicates if the payment is Customer (C) type or Bank (B) type

maturityInDays.description: Indicates the number of days within which an contract gets matured

remainingMaturityInDays.description: Indicates number of days remaining for maturity

commitmentAmount.description: Indicates the total amount which will be lent or deposited for the term

expectedBalance.description: Indicates the amount expected to be deposited by the customer

allowWithdrawal.description: Flag to indicate whether withdrawals are applicable for the account

unspecifiedCredit.description: Indicates an unallocated credit amount to an account

allowDeposit.description: Flag to indicate whether deposit is allowed to an account

allowWithdrawalUnclearedCredit.description: Flag to indicate whether withdrawals are allowed to an unallocated fund available in the account

accountWithBankBIC.description: This is the BIC code of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

pendingDeposit.description: Indicates the sum of debit transaction amounts that are yet to be processed and placed as holds on accounts, but will not be available for use

totalCredits.description: Contains the total number of credits

totalDebits.description: Contains the total number of debits

commitmentBalance.description: Indicates the total amount which will be lent or deposited for the term

lastPaidAmount.description: Indicates the original total paid amount

pendingWithdrawals.description: Contains the total withdrawal amount on hold until payment execution date

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System
